LanguageData.SpaceValuableAsteroids.label: valuable asteroids
LanguageData.SpaceValuableAsteroids.description: Small rocks containing a high concentration of precious materials. Likely towed into orbit long ago, but never mined for some unknown reason.
LanguageData.SpaceShipDebris.label: ship debris
LanguageData.SpaceShipDebris.description: A fragment of a derelict ship. Sensors indicate multiple hull breaches and minimal power signature.
LanguageData.SpaceHackableSatellite.label: damaged satellites
LanguageData.SpaceHackableSatellite.description: Ancient satellites dating back to this world's original terraformation. If repaired, they could prove useful.
LanguageData.BlackBoxMission.label: starship bow
LanguageData.BlackBoxMission.description: The front portion of an ancient starship. Scans indicate life signs and an active power signature.
